New Records: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit his first career walk-off hit
Key Match Events: Jazz Chisholm Jr. hit a game-ending infield single with one out in the 11th inning
Juan Soto hit a two-run home run in the sixth inning
Salvador Perez hit a tying sacrifice fly in the seventh inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Yankees took two of three in a series between playoff contenders
The Royals fell 4 1/2 games behind first-place Cleveland in the AL Central
Post-Match Reflections: Yankees manager Aaron Boone said it was a big series win for the Yankees
Royals manager Matt Quatraro said it was a tense game and tight
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Orioles lost 5-3 in 10 innings at Fenway Park when Tyler O'Neill hit a walk-off homer for Boston
The Yankees increased their advantage in the AL East to 1 1/2 games over Baltimore
